org.bukkit.block

Interface NoteBlock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockState, Metadatable

    public interface NoteBlock
extends BlockState
    Represents a note.

      • play

        boolean play()
        Attempts to play the note at block

        If the block is no longer a note block, this will return false

        Returns:
        true if successful, otherwise false
